Use thistemplate theme for pkgdown

Source: R/use_template.R
use_thistemplate.Rd

This function helps you set up the thistemplate theme for your package's pkgdown site. It will:

  1. Create or update _pkgdown.yml with the necessary template configuration

  2. Add thistemplate to the Config/Needs/website field in DESCRIPTION

Usage

use_thistemplate(github_url = NULL, author = NULL)

Arguments

github_url

Optional. The GitHub URL of your package. If provided, will be added to the navbar.

author

Optional. The author name. If not provided, will be extracted from DESCRIPTION.

Site built with pkgdown 2.1.3.
